articles.title: Rafael Devers home run led to benches-clearing brawl between Giants and Rockies
summary: Rafael Devers' home run sparks brawl at Coors Field, involving Giants and Rockies players
Devers hits 2-run homer off Rockies' Freeland, leading to altercation over his celebratory actions
Boston fans react to Devers' incident, highlighting sportsmanship discussions and player conduct in MLB

articles.title: Review & setlist: Young crowd was head over heels for stunt-filled Benson Boone show at TD Garden
summary: Benson Boone's high-energy show at TD Garden wows young Boston crowd, showcasing his viral fame and acrobatic stunts
23-year-old Boone's 'American Heart Tour' for second album sold out in 9 seconds, thrilling fans with 7 unexpected backflips
Boston fans left electrified by Boone's performance, setting high expectations for future concerts in the city

articles.title: 5 new cast members join ‘SNL’ after high-profile departures
summary: 5 new cast members including Ben Marshall join 'SNL' amid recent high-profile departures, injecting fresh talent into the iconic comedy show
Newcomers Tommy Brennan, Jeremy Culhane, Kam Patterson, and Veronika Slowikowska to become featured players in the upcoming 51st season
Changes at 'SNL' signal a shift in comedic direction and offer opportunities for diverse voices to shine, sparking anticipation and curiosity among Boston viewers

articles.title: ‘Star Trek’-inspired Connecticut home is listed for $1.4 million
summary: Connecticut 'Star Trek' home listed for $1.4 million, drawing sci-fi fans and architecture enthusiasts in Boston
Named Starcastle, the 5,036-square-foot home built in 1985 features futuristic design by architect Roy Mason
Bostonians intrigued by unique property trend may explore innovative housing designs near the city in the future

articles.title: Recent homes sales in Greater Boston (Sept. 3)
summary: Greater Boston sees diverse housing market with sales ranging from $340,000 to $1,175,000, reflecting varied property types and buyer preferences
Recent sales include a mix of Colonial, raised ranch, and two-family homes built between 1885 to 1985 in different neighborhoods like Abington, Acton, and Allston
Buyers and sellers navigate changing real estate landscape as prices fluctuate, impacting property values and market competitiveness in local communities

articles.title: On a night described as a ‘gut punch,’ resilient Red Sox keep on fighting
summary: Red Sox clinch 11-7 victory over Cleveland Guardians at Fenway Park, despite setbacks
